body:
Comment 2: 
nszabolcs is correct. This is not a bug. Try it in C for example:

#include <stdio.h>

int
main() {
        double a = 6;
        a *= 0.1;
        const double b = 0.6;
        printf("%f == %f -> %d\n", a, b, a == b);
        return 0;
}

% ./a.out
0.600000 == 0.600000 -> 0
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
